meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was wondrous, filling the sky with bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The magician's tricks were wondrous, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: The cat's wondrous ability to find hidden treats amazed the family.
meanings.sent4: The wondrous sight of a shooting star streaking across the night sky captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The wondrous beauty of the sunrise painted the sky in a breathtaking display.

meanings.sent1: The cake was wondrous, with layers of delicious flavors.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's performance was wondrous, breaking records left and right.
meanings.sent3: The wondrous speed of the cheetah made it the star of the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The wondrous talent of the young artist shone through in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The wondrous success of the small business inspired others to dream big.
